snippet: England coach Eddie Jones believes the six tour matches the British and Irish Lions will play next year ahead of the first test against the All Blacks on June 24 will give the touring side a significant advantage....
lead_paragraph: England coach Eddie Jones believes the six tour matches the British and Irish Lions will play next year ahead of the first test against the All Blacks on June 24 will give the touring side a significant advantage.

headline.main: Jones Believes Tough Warm-Up Games Will Help Lions Roar
headline.print_headline: Jones Believes Tough Warm-Up Games Will Help Lions Roar
